item.title: Stacey add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Do you bite your thumb at us, sir?" -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Stacey add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Stacey add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Stacey add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Stacey add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "Who are you to judge the life I live? I know I'm not perfect -and I don't live to be- but before you start pointing fingers... make sure you hands are clean!" -- Bob Marley

item.title: Stacey add a quote by Winston Groom
item.description: "Life is like a box of chocolates." -- Winston Groom

item.title: Stacey add a quote by Winston Groom
item.description: "I may not be a smart man, but I know what love is." -- Winston Groom

item.title: Stacey add a quote by William Shakespeare
